mapper.select: SELECT ds.sd_code ,st.store_info_code ,st.store_info_name ,us.member_id ,us.member_name ,ds.sd_year_month ,ds.sd_worktime ,ds.sd_pay ,ds.sd_income ,ds.sd_income_local ,ds.sd_deduction ,ds.sd_receipts ,ds.sd_pay_date ,ds.sd_reg_date FROM tb_daily_salary AS ds LEFT JOIN tb_store_info AS st ON ds.store_info_code = st.store_info_code LEFT JOIN tb_member AS us ON ds.member_id=us.member_id
